#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
    {
        long int n;
        cin>>n;
        if(n!=1){
        if(n%2==0)
        {
          long int k=n/2;
          k=-1*k;
          cout<<k<<endl;
        }
        else
        {
            long int k=n/2;
          k=-1*k;
          k=k+n;
          cout<<k<<endl;
        }
    }
     else
            cout<<"1"<<endl;

    }
    return 0;
}
